title: Spooky Cat
description: Make a spooky cat with code
completion_text: Nice work - you made a spooky black cat! Try changing its color or even its tail! Don't forget to share your cat afterwards.

steps.hint: We can make l'arrière-plan a spooky black by **tapant** `background black`.
Définis the stroke to zero so we have no outlines. **Tape** `stroke 0`
Now let's set the color of the full moon. **Tape** `color lightgray`
Create a nice big circle for the moon. **Tape** `circle 230`.
Now move downwards so we can draw the grass on the ground. **Tape** `moveTo 250, 500`.
It's night time, so we'll make the grass a dark green. **Tape** `color darkgreen`.
Dessine the grassy hill with une ellipse so it's round. **Tape** `ellipse 300, 100`
Now set the color of the cat! To make it black, **tape** `color black`.
Déplace-toi the cursor to draw the cat in the middle! **Tape** `moveTo 250, 250`.
Let's draw the head with une ellipse. **Tape** `ellipse 60, 40`.
Let's move to right and up to draw the first ear. **Tape** `moveTo 280, 220`.
We'll use the polygon function to make a nice pointy ear! **Tape** `polygon 0, -40, 28, 20, close`.
Déplace-toi vers la gauche de 60 so we can draw the other ear! **Tape** `move -60`.
This ear is a reflection of the other one! **Tape** `polygon 0, -40, -28, 20, close`.
Let's make the neck underneath. **Tape** `moveTo 250, 310`.
Dessine it using une ellipse! **Tape** `ellipse 30, 50`.
Now lets make the body below. **Tape** `moveTo 250, 360`.
We'll use a bigger ellipse this time round! **tape** `ellipse 50, 60`.
Now we need to move down and right to make the tail! **Tape** `moveTo 320, 380`.
Let's use a sneaky text trick to make a curvy tail. **Tape** `font 150`.
We'll make the text bold to make a large. **Tape** `bold true`.
Great! Now draw the tail by **tapant** `text 'S'`.
Finally, we'll make the eyes. **Tape** `moveTo 225, 250`.
Définis the color to yellow. **Tape** `color yellow`.
We'll draw it using une ellipse. **Tape** `ellipse 14, 6`.
Now for the pupil! Définis the color à noir (black). **Tape** `color black`.
Make un cercle of radius 6. **Tape** `circle 6`.
Great! Now lets move right to do the other eye. **Tape** `moveTo 275, 250`.
Définis the color back to yellow. **Tape** `color yellow`.
Make the same ellipse as before. **Tape** `ellipse 14,6`.
Définis the color back à noir (black). **tape** `color black`.
Lastly create the second pupil. **Tape** `circle 6`.
